column5: Stayed at the Ojibway resort a lot during the mid nineties on Eagle lake, is it still in operation? I've been fishing Ear falls and Red lake area haven't be n th re in awhile. I remember it being nice to we always caught a lot of fish
don't beleive they are.north shore lodge is the next closest.nice resort too.

Eagle Lake has become a great fishery and gets better every year in my opinion. I've been going to Birch Dale Lodge www.birchdalelodge.com for 26 years and have noticed the difference the slot limits have made on the lake. I don't believe Ojibway is in business any longer either.
